name: VCF (State Variable)
description: Voltage controlled filter using the common 'State Variable' topology. Provides simultaneous low-pass, band-pass, and high-pass outputs, plus a blended output. Processes multiple busses based on Width parameter.

parameters.name: Blend
parameters.description: Sets the blend for the blended output (LP/BP/HP).

parameters.name: Sweep
parameters.description: Manual frequency sweep control (offsets frequency CV).

parameters.name: Resonance
parameters.description: Sets the filter resonance.

parameters.name: Saturate
parameters.description: Enables internal saturation stage to control high resonance.

parameters.name: Blended gain
parameters.description: Level control for the blended output.

parameters.name: Lowpass gain
parameters.description: Level control for the lowpass output.

parameters.name: Bandpass gain
parameters.description: Level control for the bandpass output.

parameters.name: Highpass gain
parameters.description: Level control for the highpass output.

parameters.name: Audio input
parameters.description: The audio input bus.

parameters.name: Width
parameters.description: The number of busses to process (e.g., 2 for stereo).

parameters.name: Frequency input
parameters.description: The frequency CV input bus (1V/octave).

parameters.name: Resonance input
parameters.description: The resonance CV input bus (5V = full range).

parameters.name: Blended output
parameters.description: The output bus for the blended signal.

parameters.name: Blended mode
parameters.description: Add/replace mode for the blended signal.

parameters.name: Lowpass output
parameters.description: The output bus for the lowpass signal.

parameters.name: Lowpass mode
parameters.description: Add/replace mode for the lowpass signal.

parameters.name: Bandpass output
parameters.description: The output bus for the bandpass signal.

parameters.name: Bandpass mode
parameters.description: Add/replace mode for the bandpass signal.

parameters.name: Highpass output
parameters.description: The output bus for the highpass signal.

parameters.name: Highpass mode
parameters.description: Add/replace mode for the highpass signal.

parameters.name: 0.00 ST A manual frequency sweep control; offsets the frequency CV. Resonance
parameters.description: Sets the filter resonance.

parameters.name: 0 28 0 The resonance CV input bus. Scaled such that 5V corresponds to the full range. Blended output
parameters.description: The output bus for the blended signal.

parameters.name: 0.00 ST A manual frequency sweep control; offsets the frequency CV. Resonance
parameters.description: Sets the filter resonance.

parameters.name: 0 28 0 The resonance CV input bus. Scaled such that 5V corresponds to the full range. Blended output
parameters.description: The output bus for the blended signal.
